messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] it just clicked
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/14/2002 4:16:40 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Anna, I m so glad the weekend made a difference. That was my goal! (and to selfishly be
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/14/2002 4:16:40 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> I know that some of the speakers and organizers of the conference
> frequent this board. I wanted them to know how they had touched
> me. It was so wonderful to be surrounded by people that love and
> respect kids and young adults. It was refreshing and reaffirming.
> I can't thank them enough for what they have given me and this was
> just one example. I had many other such moments, too many to
> describe.
>

Anna,

I'm so glad the weekend made a difference. That was my goal! (and to
selfishly be able to meet these folks IRL too!)

That "clicking" you heard was that paradigm shift you hear here all the time.
Congratulations! <g>

Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
